1.title: Big in Japan
1.plot: Todd invents a revolutionary new brewing device but to keep up with demand he must head to Japan, a notoriously eccentric place to do business. In Tokyo and Osaka, Todd has his work cut out for him closing his cross-cultural deal.

2.title: Havana Nights
2.plot: The climate is perfect for Todd to explore Cuba, an island that's been off limits his entire life. In Havana, Todd meets up with guest star Les Stroud (Survivorman), and the two embark on an eventful journey across the island.

3.title: American in Paris
3.plot: Todd plans a food truck café at the Louvre, but innovators don't often get a warm welcome in Paris. Todd meets American chefs and learns the secrets to the City of Lights, then he's off to Morocco in search of a rare machine.

4.title: Dr. Carmichael, I Presume?
4.plot: Todd marks the 20th anniversary of his company, La Colombe, and 10 years of marriage to singer Lauren Hart. Heading to Zambia to find the perfect anniversary roast, he ends up on an adventure that's not for the feint of heart.

5.title: Turkish Delight
5.plot: Todd heads to Turkey to meet up with his friend Hamdi Ulakaya, the founder of Chobani Yogurt. Todd explores the catacombs and historical wonders of Cappadocia in Central Turkey, and the many delights of Istanbul, the city where east meets west. But as the regional struggle against ISIS spills into the streets, protests grow larger every day. When Hamdi turns the tables on Todd, the two men find themselves en route to the Syrian border.

6.title: Iceland's Strange Brew
6.plot: Todd Carmichael made headlines breaking the world record for fastest solo trek across Antarctica. Now he returns to the ice, only this time in Iceland. In Reykjavik he meets drummer Siggi Baldursson from Bjork's band, "The Sugarcubes," who introduces him to some local oddities. Then Todd heads deep into the land of fire and ice on a quest to devise a unique Icelandic coffee beer. But Iceland can be a strange place, and it's a journey where Todd finds himself fishing at the edge of the Arctic circle and getting far too close to an erupting volcano.

7.title: Jamaica Me Coffee
7.plot: Todd invented a new draft iced latte product for his company, La Colombe. The next step is to find the right coffee to put in it. The search takes him to Jamaica, famous for its Blue Mountain Coffee. But this trip is about more than coffee. Todd ditches the comfort of the resorts, seeking the Jamaica few tourists ever see. He explores the back streets of Kingston, tastes the island's BBQ at authentic jerk pits, and treks off-road to the Maroons, a community who have lived in the mountains for hundreds of years.

8.title: A Man, a Plan... Panama
8.plot: There's one country so important to Todd's business that he must go there every year. That country is Panama, and it boasts one of the fastest growing economies in the world. Panama also produces the most expensive coffees in the world. Todd's journey takes him through the transformed barrios of Panama City, to restaurants and cafés run by former gang members and trades punches with his childhood idol and former world champion boxer Roberto Duran. High in the mountain town of Boquete, Todd meets with a coffee genius who stands at the forefront of the industry and ...

1.title: Haiti
1.plot: Todd Carmichael goes to the island nation of Haiti in search of a rare, rumored colonial strain of coffee plant called "Typica" noted as being some of the most savored coffee on the planet.

2.title: Bolivia
2.plot: Todd Carmichael begins his Bolivian journey short of breath at 12,000 feet in the world's highest capital, La Paz. The coffee plants prove to be hard to find due to the more profitable crop, Coca - the plant to make cocaine.

3.title: Madagascar
3.plot: Todd Carmichael travels to Madagascar because it is rumored to be a source of high-quality "Robusta," a utility-grade strain of coffee largely avoided by coffee aficionados. Todd thinks the exception could be hidden in Madagascar.

4.title: Borneo
4.plot: Todd crosses ancient bamboo bridges, eats slimy grub, and sleeps in the wild, all in the hope of bringing a rare exotic "Liberica" coffee bean back home to his roasters.

5.title: Ethiopia
5.plot: Todd seeks a new discovery in the birthplace of coffee - Ethiopia. He avoids interference from the government body and brave roads with high fatality rates, evade wild predators and avoid confrontations with gun-toting sentries.

6.title: Cambodia
6.plot: Todd Carmichael travels to Cambodia, where part of the country still has active land mines. He eats unique spider delicacies and goes on a brutal motorcycle trek through dense jungles ravaged by monsoons.

7.title: Papua New Guinea
7.plot: Todd Carmichael travels the infamous roads in Papua New Guinea, known for hijackings, murders, and fatal accidents from pot-holes larger than his truck. He bribes private guards and navigates a rainstorm in a small bush plane.

8.title: Colombia
8.plot: Todd Carmichael makes a near fatal mistake on the unforgiving wet mountain roads of Colombia. Flipping his truck in the middle of the night, Todd is stranded with only his cameraman, as they attempt to look for a way home.

1.title: Mexican Motherlode
1.plot: On the verge of losing an important deal with a celebrity chef, Todd heads to Mexico's deadliest state in search of a legendary coffee. When his contact ends up murdered, Todd must adapt to get home alive and save the deal.

2.title: Himalayan Outpost (Nepal)
2.plot: An impossible promise sends Todd to Nepal, where Maoist rebels threaten his every move. An ex-Soviet pilot drops him deep in the mountains where Todd enlists locals and their animals to help get the coffee out to close the deal.

3.title: When in Rome w/ Batali
3.plot: An encounter with Mario Batali in Rome leads Todd deep into the Amazon where he must dodge gunmen and enlist the help of the local resistance to find a key ingredient that will convince Mario to put his name on a killer espresso

4.title: Golden Triangle
4.plot: To expand his cafés to West Elm stores across America, Todd Carmichael must get coffee out of Thailand fast. But when the route leads him into Myanmar, he must negotiate past guns and borders in an epic race to get the coffee home.

5.title: War Gin
5.plot: A school that Todd Carmichael helped build is burned down by militants, so Todd heads to Uganda to fight back after securing a deal with Dean & DeLuca that could help rebuild the school. But when a series of cultural obstacles confound all efforts, he must enter a blood contract to sustain the school.

6.title: Mayan Fortress
6.plot: Todd Carmichael heads to Guatemala to source just the right coffee for a revolutionary brewing machine. But when he finds himself in the cross hairs of a mafia-like kingpin, he must meet the man face-to-face in order to return with the goods.

7.title: Guns and Lions
7.plot: Winds of change hit the Four Seasons Hotel when the new manager asks Todd Carmichael to find a mythical Tanzanian AAA coffee. But when Todd comes face-to-face with lions and poachers, he must arm himself to get out alive.

8.title: Monsoon Moonsine
8.plot: Todd has been secretly distilling rum for years and is almost ready to release the delicious results, an small-batch rum infused with super-expensive monsoon-aged coffee beans from India, to the public.

imdb.plot outline: Would you risk your life for the perfect cup of coffee? Todd Carmichael would. As owner of La Colombe Torrefaction, a premium coffee company based in Philadelphia, he travels the globe, sleeping under his car, avoiding warlords and bodily-harm, risking it all to bring back the perfect cup o' joe. His business focuses on the best - coffee so rare it's sought by the world's top chefs and restaurants. Carmichael seeks out the most exotic, fascinating and dangerous places to find the perfect seed in the coffee plant. There's an amazing story behind every cup.
imdb.title: Dangerous Grounds
plot: Would you risk your life for the perfect cup of coffee? Todd Carmichael would. As owner of La Colombe Torrefaction, a premium coffee company based in Philadelphia, he travels the globe, sleeping under his car, avoiding warlords and bodily-harm, risking it all to bring back the perfect cup o' joe. His business focuses on the best - coffee so rare it's sought by the world's top chefs and restaurants. Carmichael seeks out the most exotic, fascinating and dangerous places to find the perfect seed in the coffee plant. There's an amazing story behind every cup.::Travel Channel
